Package au.csiro.pathling.security

Class SecurityAspect

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.security.SecurityAspect
@Component @Profile("core") @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="pathling", name="auth.enabled", havingValue="true") @Order(100) public class SecurityAspect extends Object
The aspect that inserts checks relating to security.
Author:
Piotr Szul
